Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
itself \it*self"\ ([i^]t*s[e^]lf"), pron. The neuter reflexive pronoun of {It}; as, the thing is good in itself; it stands by itself. [1913 Webster]
Borrowing of foreigners, in itself, makes not the kingdom rich or poor. --Locke. [1913 Webster]
